name: Spotlight (NicknEmart)
description:
In this game you play as Esth, a little guy who knows how to walk and jump, and wear hats.

The game is playable, but very short, as it is far from finished. I'm publishing it anyway though, because it probabily won't be continued, at least not for now.

Enjoy this few-minutes experience, as I downscope my future games ;)
